Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Judge and the New York Yankees will face Miles Mikolas starting for the St. Louis Cardinals in the final game of a three-game series on Sunday at 1:35 p.m. ET.
The Yankees have a 3.76 team ERA ranking sixth among all MLB pitching staffs, while Cardinals pitchers have a combined ERA of 4.16, ranking 18th in MLB.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be broadcast on Bally Sports and can be streamed for free on Fubo.
Odds for the game favor the Yankees as the favorite, with odds of -207, while the Cardinals are the underdog at +171.
The over/under for the game is set at 9 runs.
